reviews.review: nothing but respect for my president
This was the second worst movie i have ever seen and it is so great
This movie truly is not funny at all. Beat to death and a desperate attempt for money, this movie makes me want to die

The problem with rating these movies is keeping the intended audience in mind. Obviously, the film makers aren't pandering to adult crowds. This film is for children. That being said, the film severely lacks originality. There is terrible dialogue, even for an animated film. There were a few chuckles scattered around the film, but they are overshadowed by a thin plot and cheesy characters. Honestly, this seems like more of a rough draft than a final product. 
I would say only the youngest audience would enjoy this film. Better to red box this one. But it's not worth the wait.

Splendid, an insightful movie about our society, and is full of social commentary. This has been the greatest movie that I have seen all year, it has stunning visuals, incredible characters, it's just an amazing movie 10/10 IGN

Absolutely incredible movie, the cinematography and plot blew me, and others in the cinema, away. I couldn't afford to see it as many times as essential, so I got a job as the projector manager. I spent my life making money while watching the emoji movie again and again.

Absolutely terrible. The weak and clich√©d plot combined with shameless marketing and awful attempts at humour make this monstrosity nothing more than a bootleg Wreck-It Ralph/The Lego Movie hybrid with half the joy and double the boredom. Only good to keep the kids entertained for an hour or so before they too, get bored.

Absolutely amazing, I would see this movie 10,000,000 more times if I could I guess you can say it's ?????? The best (it's incredibly difficult to pick one favorite moment/character by the way) is Sir Patrick Stewart's performance of the Poop Emoji, yes THE LEGEND Sir Patrick Stewart. You see, you need the best to be the best so it is understandable they wanted Sir Patrick Stewart, along with the entire cast, for this movie. In conclusion, despite what the critics say about this, it is easily THE movie of 2017, and must be worshipped, or ????, but really this movie was ??????
I just saw the Emoji Movie and I have to say, I don't think I could have gone on living without seeing it. Despite critic's opinions, I have to say this movie is a sold ??. It deserves an Emmy.
